Text: 1999 Odisha cyclone:  Taking advantage of highly favorable conditions, the storm rapidly intensified, attaining super cyclonic storm intensity on 28 October before peaking with winds of 260 km/h (160 mph) and a record-low pressure of 912 mbar (hPa; 26.93 inHg).

Text: 1999 Odisha cyclone: The storm maintained this intensity as it made landfall on Odisha on 29 October.
